# TailwindCSS Smooth Shadow Plugin

Soft, multi-layered shadows that extend Tailwindâ€™s shadow scale. Utilities include `smooth-shadow` plus sizes from `smooth-shadow-xs` up to `smooth-shadow-2xl`. Color tokens like `smooth-shadow-red-500` are supported, or rely on `currentColor`.

## Getting Started

- README: https://github.com/flornkm/shadow-plugin/blob/main/README.md
